downloadTitle: Visual Studio 2008 SP1 Compatibility GDR for Visual Studio 2012 Team Foundation Server and Team Foundation Service Preview
downloadDescription: Provides compatibility between all VS 2008 products that connect to Visual Studio 2012 Team Foundation Server
detailsSection: This patch will provide compatiblity for all for the Visual Studio 2008 products that connect to Visual Studio 2012 Team Foundation Server
systemRequirementsSection:
• Windows XP (x86) with Service Pack 3 or later (all editions)
  • Windows Server 2003 (x86) with Service Pack 2 or later (all editions)
  • Windows Server 2003 R2 (x86) or later (all editions)
  • Windows Vista (x86 and x64) with Service Pack 2 or later (all editions except Starter Edition)
  • Windows Server 2008 (x86 and x64) with Service Pack 2 or later
  • Windows 7 (x86 and x64)
  • Windows Server 2008 R2 (x64)
Supported Architectures:
  • 32-Bit (x86)
  • 64-Bit (x64)
Hardware Requirements:
  • Computer that has a 2.2GHz or faster processor
  • 1 GB RAM for x86
  • 8 GB of available hard disk space
Prerequisites:
  • Microsoft Visual Studio 2008 SP1
installInstructionSection:
1. On this page, click Download to start the download.
  2. To save the download on your computer so that you can install it later, click Save.
  3. To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
